author: Reuters Editorial
title: Sheltering in place in Tokyo's small apartments
description: As Japan enters a coronavirus state of emergency, millions of people are being asked to stay at home - but often that means staying indoors in tiny living spaces, especially in densely populated Tokyo.
content:
TOKYO (Reuters) - As Japan enters a coronavirus state of emergency, millions of people are being asked to stay at home - but often that means staying indoors in tiny living spaces, especially in densely populated Tokyo.
